questions: Tell me procedure to prepare Juice
answers: Step 1 Wash, peel & chop the fruit  To prepare this healthy fruit juice, wash all the fruits properly and peel and chop them if required. Step 2 Blend the fruits with water, ice cubes, lemon juice & honey Add them to a food processor with water, lemon juice, ice cubes and honey and blend them together. Step 3 Strain Homemade Fruit Juice into glasses!  Then, pour the juice into a chilled glass using a strainer to remove the pulp. Garnish with mint leaves and serve.
